component.name: neovim-gtk
component.summary: GTK UI for neovim written in rust using gtk-rs bindings

description.p: GTK ui for neovim written in rust using gtk-rs bindings. With ligatures support. This project began as a fork of @daa84's neovim-gtk.

There are a very large number of improvements from @daa84's version, including:
Lots of bugfixes
We're fully ported to GTK4, and have a Snapshot based renderer instead of a cairo based renderer
Smooth resizing
